message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $18,000. I believe it's a great deal considering its value. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your product, but I can only pay up to $15,000 for it. Could we possibly meet in the middle?
Bob, I understand your position. I'm willing to come down to $16,500 for the product. This is still a great deal for you, considering its value to you. What do you say?
Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I'm willing to pay $15,500 for the product. It's a fair compromise considering its value to me.
Bob, I appreciate you coming up on your offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $16,000.  This is a fair price that recognizes the value of the product for both of us. What do you think?
Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm willing to pay $15,750 for the product. It's a reasonable price considering its value to me.
Bob, I appreciate your persistence.  I'm willing to come down to $16,250. I believe this price is fair and reflects the value of the product. Let's close this deal!
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go above $15,900 for the product. I hope we can agree on this price.
Bob, I understand your position, and we're getting very close.  I'm willing to go down to $16,000 one last time. This is a good deal for both of us. Let's close this deal now.
Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm willing to pay $15,800 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.
